snippet: A culinary journey through Mumbai shows that there's more to South Indian food than steamed idlis and coconut chutney.
abstract: A culinary journey through Mumbai shows that there's more to South Indian food than steamed idlis and coconut chutney.
lead_paragraph: South Indian food - a catchall term that's come to mean the fluffy idlis and crispy dosas from the southern states of Tamil Nadu, Karnataka, Kerala and Andhra Pradesh - is served across Mumbai at fast-food restaurants  like Sukh Sagar and Shiv Sagar.

headline.main: Beyond Idlis and Chutney in Mumbai
